Class Queries

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Queries

  • public class Queries
extends java.lang.Object
    The class with all important queries.

      • getRandomRepoProblemWithProperties

                                                  int minDifficulty,
                                                  int maxDifficulty)
        Fetch a random problem from the problem repo with given problems.
        Parameters:
        oldIds - Ids of problems already completed.
        features - Features of the problem to have.
        minDifficulty - Minimal difficulty of the problem.
        maxDifficulty - Maximal difficulty of the problem.
        Returns:
        Problem with given property.

      • insertRepoStatistics

        public boolean insertRepoStatistics(int problemId,
                                    int playedGamesId,
                                    int order,
                                    int waves,
                                    int preMistakes,
                                    int postMistakes)
        Insert statistics about a repo problem.
        Parameters:
        problemId - Id of the repo problem.
        playedGamesId - Id of the game session.
        order - When the problem was played.
        waves - Amount of waves it took to complete the problem.
        preMistakes - Amount of mistakes made on the preconditions.
        postMistakes - Amount of mistakes made on the postconditions.
        Returns:
        Whether the insertion was succesful.

      • insertScore

        public boolean insertScore(int userId,
                           int problemId,
                           int score,
                           boolean legitimate)
        Insert a score in the database.
        Parameters:
        userId - Id of the user that gets the score.
        problemId - Id of the problem the user got the score on.
        score - Score.
        legitimate - Whether the score was gained without cheating.
        Returns:
        Whether the insertion succeeded.

      • insertStatistics

        public boolean insertStatistics(int problemId,
                                int playedGamesId,
                                int totalTime,
                                int problemTime,
                                int sidetrackCount,
                                int preMistakes,
                                int postMistakes)
        Insert game session statistics in the database.
        Parameters:
        problemId - Id of the problem
        playedGamesId - Played game Id.
        totalTime - Total time spent on the problem
        problemTime - Total time spent on the teacher problem
        sidetrackCount - Amount of sidetrack problems played
        preMistakes - Amount of mistakes made on precondition.
        postMistakes - Amount of mistakes made on postcondition.
        Returns:
        Whether the insertion succeeded or failed
